name: Fast Dating!
description:
Made for ludum dare 51 in 48 hours, check it out on the website!

How about getting yourself a significant other? Just play this game and you’ll be fine! Find your perfect soulmate(s) by seeing what they have in common with you!

How to play

Play by matching up your preferences with the person that appears in front of you! Click the sentences that align with you, and swipe right to match with them or swipe left to literally throw them away. Pay attention to the objects they have with them, and see if they have the same interests as you. But be fast, you only have 10 seconds for everyone that passes! Try to obtain a high score!
